nodes.text: Instead of credits as a reward for winning races in Anchorhead, during the Jedi Civil War, Motta the Hutt gave racers race bonds. These digital certificates were accepted throughout the galaxy and could be sold for about sixty credits per note, with the exception Yavin, in which they can be sold for around one hundred and fifty. Revan had won 120 bonds by the time he became the Tatooine sector champion.
